phone.title: ToulouZen wishes to access your phone
phone.description: ToulouZen needs permission for calls so that we can redirect you to the phone in case of danger

cancel_ride_dialog.title: Deleting the ride
cancel_ride_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this ride ?

end_ride_dialog.title: End of the ride
end_ride_dialog.description: Have you arrived at the right place and completed your ride ?

ride.end_ride_location: Where do you want to go

email_already_in_use.title: Adresse e-mail
email_already_in_use.description: This e-mail address is already in use!

weak_password.title: Password
weak_password.description: The password used is too weak, use at least 8 characters, adding numbers, capital letters and special characters

created_account_dialog.title: Your personal space has been created
created_account_dialog.description: We welcome you to the ToulouZen family!

reset_password.title: Reset your password
reset_password.description: Please enter your email adress below and we will send you a link to reset your password.

reset_password_dialog.title: Reset yout password
reset_password_dialog.description: If you press "Yes", you will receive an e-mail to the e-mail address you entered. If you do not receive anything, try again by checking that the e-mail address you entered is correct.
